nodes.text: The man was present on the planet Haidoral Prime when the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry fought the Galactic Empire in 3 ABY. During the 61st's recruitment drive in the central plaza, the man volunteered to join. As he inspected the volunteers, First Sergeant Hazram Namir inspected the man and plugged him as an Imperial spy. Quartermaster Hober, the recruitment officer, accepted the man regardless.
When the 61st fought on the jungle planet Coyerti, the man took a grazing blaster shot for a native. The action was listed on a report which Namir read after the campaign.
The rebel appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
